display.title: Optional display data
display.description: If specified, "icon","description" and "title" must also be specified. If this is not specified, the advancement will not be on any page. If it is defined, even if empty, it will appear.

item.title: Item name
item.description: The name of the item to use as the icon.

nbt.title: Item NBT
nbt.description: The NBT of the item to display. Can set 'CustomModelData' or 'Damage' to use different textures.

title.title: Advancement title
title.description: This is the title which will show when the advancement is hovered over. If it is the root advancement, this is also the title of the page. This is also shown in the toast upon getting the advancement

description.title: Advancement description
description.description: Must be specified. The description of the advancement. Will be only seen when the advancement icon is hovered over in the advancements menu.

frame.title: Advancement frame
frame.description: The frame of the advancement. Task is the default frame, goal represents an objective, challenge represents a (difficult) challenge

background.title: Page background texture (Root advancement only [No parent])

show_toast.title: Show toast?
show_toast.description: Whether to show a popup window (elsewhere toast) when the advancement is obtained. Defaults to true

announce_to_chat.title: Mention obtaining
announce_to_chat.description: Whether to put that this advancement has been obtained into the chat. Can be overwritten by the announceAdvancements gamerule

hidden.title: Hidden until completed
hidden.description: If true, this advancement will not be shown until it has been obtained. Default is false

parent.title: Parent advancement (if not specified and "display" is, it will create a new page)

criteria.title: Criteria
criteria.description: The criteria object of the advancement. At least one criteria must be specified. The name of the sub-object is the criterion id, as accessed in "requirements" and the <criterion> argument of /advancement

requirements.title: Requirements - AND of ORs
requirements.description: This is a list of lists to specify required advancements - For one sub-list to complete, one of the criteria within it must be completed (OR operation). For the full outer list to complete (and the advancement be granted) all sub-lists must be completed (AND operation)

rewards.title: Rewards object
rewards.description: The rewards to give when the advancement is granted

recipes.title: Recipes
recipes.description: A list of recipes to give to the player. Uses the same name locator as the `/recipe` command

loot.title: Loot tables
loot.description: A list of loot tables to give to the player. Uses the path to the loot table (with the first folder within the loot_tables folder being the namespace)

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Experience to give to the player

function.title: A function to run as the player
function.description: A single function to run as the player. Uses the path to the function (with the first folder within the function folder being the namespace)

trigger.title: Destroyed bee nest
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the player changes dimension (such as by going through a portal)

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

trigger.title: Breed animals
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the player breeds two animals

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

parent.title: Conditions to test against either of the parents
parent.description: Using both parent and partner is only useful when using horses/donkeys

partner.title: Conditions to test against either of the parents

child.title: Conditions to test against the child entity

trigger.title: Brew a potion
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the player brews a potion

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

trigger.title: Change dimension
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the player changes dimension (such as by going through a portal)

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

trigger.title: Build a beacon
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the player is near a beacon when it's level changes

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

trigger.title: Use up an item
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the player uses up either a Totem of Undying for 'used_totem', or eats an item, for 'consume_item'

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

item.title: Item
item.description: This will be checked against the item used up

trigger.title: Cure a zombie villager
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the player uses a splash weakness potion and a golden apple to cure a villager

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

trigger.title: Changed effects
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the potion effects on the player change

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

effects.title: The potion effects of the player

trigger.title: Enchanted an item
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the player enchanted an item

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

trigger.title: Enter a block
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the player moves

conditions.title: The block to check
conditions.description: The block which was entered to check the trigger

trigger.title: Entity hurt the player
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the player is hurt by an entity

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

trigger.title: The player hurt an entity
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever player hurt an entity

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

trigger.title: Death occurs
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the player kills or is killed by an entity

conditions.title: The death object
conditions.description: The conditions object is a direct reference to a death object

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

trigger.title: Impossible trigger
trigger.description: The impossible trigger can be only granted with a command

trigger.title: Inventory contents change
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the items in the inventory of the player change. This includes moving slots etc.

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

occupied.title: Occupied amount
occupied.description: How many of the slots in the player's inventory have an item in them

full.title: Full slots
full.description: How many of the slots in the player's inventory have an item with the maximum amount of the item in them in them

empty.title: Empty slots
empty.description: The number of the slots in the player's inventory have no item in them

trigger.title: Changed durability
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the durability of an item in the inventory of a player changes

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

durability.title: Absolute durability
durability.description: The absolute durability of the item after the change

delta.title: Change in durability
delta.description: The amount that the durability changed by

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

location.description: The center of the block where the item was used

item.description: The item that was used on the block

trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the player is levitating

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

duration.title: Time applied
duration.description: The amount of time (in ticks) that the player must have been levitating

distance.title: Distance travelled
distance.description: How far the player must have travelled whilst under the effect of the levitation

trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the player sleeps (for "slept_in_bed"), or once every 20 ticks ("location")

conditions.title: Location of the player
conditions.description: The location of the player at the time of checking (for "slept_in_bed" this is just after they went to sleep)

trigger.description: This criteria will be checked every 20 ticks

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

entered.title: Entering the nether
entered.description: Where the player entered the nether (into the overworld)

exited.title: Exit portal location
exited.description: Where the player left the nether (into the overworld)

distance.title: Distance travelled through the nether
distance.description: The distance between the entry nether portal and the exit nether portal (in the overworld)

trigger.title: Placing blocks
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the player places a block

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: The placed block

item.title: Item placed
item.description: The item placed to create the block

location.title: Location of block
location.description: The location at which the block is placed

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

loot_table.description: The loot table that was populated

trigger.title: Unlock recipe
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the player unlocks a recipe

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

recipe.title: The name of the recipe
recipe.description: The recipe which must be unlocked. Does not act retroactively, so if an advancement was present after a recipe was given, it will not itself activate

trigger.title: Something with an entity
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the player summons an entity or tames an animal. Summoning an entity only counts the wither, iron golems and snow golems, not spawn eggs

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

trigger.title: Thrown item picked up by entity

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

item.description: The thrown item that was picked up by the entity

entity.description: The entity that picked up the thrown item

trigger.title: Tick
trigger.description: The tick trigger is given once each tick

trigger.title: Use eye of ender
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the player uses an eye of ender

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

distance.title: Distance from player to stronghold
distance.description: The number of blocks in the XZ plane between the player and the stronghold - See pythagoras

trigger.title: Trade with a villager
trigger.description: This criteria will be checked whenever the player trades with a villager

conditions.title: Required conditions
conditions.description: All of these conditions must pass for the criteria to be activated

entity_conditions.title: Conditions
entity_conditions.description: The conditions that the entity must pass
